name: NBStudio
tagline: IDE for InterSystems Cach√© on Netbeans Platform
body:
It is unfinished project. Currently only possible view and simple editing MAC-routines, and view CLS-files without editing. Simple syntax highlighting and check errors. This project based on NetBeans Platform.

### Running 
Download or clone project, open in NetBeans, and Run project NBStudio.

### Screenshots
![Edit Class](images/NBStudioEditClass.png)
![Edit Routine](images/NBStudioEditRtn.png)

### Authors and Contributors
Dmitry Maslennikov @daimor.

### Support or Contact
Please send all support and feature requests to [Dmitry Maslennikov](mailto:mrdaimor@gmail.com?subject=NBStudio) and he will respond at his earliest convenience.
